verses.verse: Woe<WH1945> to those who devise<WH2803> iniquity<WH205> and work<WH6466> evil<WH7451> on their beds!<WH4904> When the morning<WH1242> is light,<WH216> they practice<WH6213> it,<WH3426> because it is in the power<WH410> of their hand.<WH3027>

They covet<WH2530> fields,<WH7704> and seize<WH1497> them;<WH1004> and houses, and take them away:<WH5375> and they oppress<WH6231> a man<WH1397> and his house,<WH1004> even a man<WH376> and his heritage.<WH5159>

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2803> I am planning against these people<WH4940> a disaster,<WH7451> from which you will not remove<WH4185> your necks,<WH6677> neither will you walk<WH3212> haughtily;<WH7317> for it is an evil<WH7451> time.<WH6256>

In that day<WH3117> they will take up<WH5375> a parable<WH4912> against you,<WH5091> and lament with a doleful<WH5093> lamentation,<WH5092> saying,<WH559> <WH7703> 'We are utterly ruined!<WH7703> My people<WH5971>'s possession<WH2506> is divided<WH4171> up.<WH4185> Indeed he takes it from me and assigns<WH2505> our fields<WH7704> to traitors!<WH7725>'"
Therefore you will have no one who divides<WH7993> the land<WH2256> by lot<WH1486> in the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
"Don't<WH5197> prophesy!" They prophesy.<WH5197> "Don't<WH5197> prophesy about these things.<WH3639> Disgrace won't<WH5253> overtake us."

Shall it be said,<WH559> O house<WH1004> of Jacob:<WH3290> "Is the Spirit<WH7307> of Yahweh<WH3068> angry?<WH7114> Are these his doings?<WH4611> Don't<WH1697> my words do good<WH3190> to him who walks<WH1980> blamelessly?<WH3477>"

But lately<WH865> my people<WH5971> have risen up<WH6965> as an enemy.<WH341> You strip<WH6584> the robe<WH145> and<WH4136> clothing<WH8008> from those who pass<WH5674> by without a care,<WH983> returning<WH7725> from battle.<WH4421>
You drive the women<WH802> of my people<WH5971> out<WH1644> from their pleasant<WH8588> houses;<WH1004> from their young children<WH5768> you take away<WH3947> my blessing<WH1926> forever.<WH5769>
Arise,<WH6965> and depart!<WH3212> For this is not your resting<WH4496> place,<WH2930> because of uncleanness that destroys,<WH2254> even with a grievous<WH4834> destruction.<WH2256>

If<WH3863> a man<WH376> walking<WH1980> in a spirit<WH7307> of falsehood<WH8267> lies:<WH3576> "I will prophesy<WH5197> to you of wine<WH3196> and of strong drink;<WH7941>" he would be the prophet<WH5197> of this people.<WH5971>

I will surely<WH622> assemble,<WH622> Jacob,<WH3290> all of you;<WH6908> I will surely gather<WH6908> the remnant<WH7611> of Israel;<WH3478> I will put<WH7760> them together<WH3162> as the sheep<WH6629> of Bozrah,<WH1223> as a flock<WH5739> in the midst<WH8432> of their pasture;<WH1699> they will swarm<WH1949> with people.<WH120>

He who breaks<WH6555> open the way goes up<WH5927> before<WH6440> them.<WH6555> They break through<WH5674> the gate,<WH8179> and go out.<WH3318> And their king<WH4428> passes<WH5674> on before<WH6440> them,<WH3068> with Yahweh at their head.<WH7218>
